review_text: Good quality all around. Terminator: Salvation + Skyline

_Revolt_ is **far** from the perfect movie, but every fault it has is an excusable one. It's about as good as a movie can be without fully crossing over that line into the area of "I'd actually recommend it".

_Final rating:★★½ - Had a lot that appealed to me, didn’t quite work as a whole._
